name: the cloud hat
notes:
the cloud hat is a staple pattern here at the lamb & kid! knit bottom up in the round, this hat features a ribbed brim that is folded over when worn. our original version was designed in the lamb & kid big birdie, which creates a fluffy and feminine cloud-like fabric, hence the name! version 2 of the cloud hat includes an additional size for your littlest family and friends, which we knit in our fletcher aran base, a non-superwash organic merino that suits the whole family!

samples shown
big birdie in color rosehip and fletcher aran in hi-vis and penny

sizes
(child small) child large/adult small (adult large)

finished measurements
approx. (17) 19 (21)” circumference at widest part and (10.5) 12.5 (12.5)” tall

yarn requirements
*please note these are yarn estimates. the amount used will depend on yarn, your personal gauge, and any modifications you make.*

the lamb & kid big birdie (79% baby alpaca, 21% silk; 174 yards/160 meters per 100g); 1 skein.

the lamb & kid fletcher aran (100% non-superwash organic merino; 181 yards per 100g); 1 skein

suggested needles
*needles listed are suggested.*
gauge needle: size us 9/ 5.5mm, 16”/40cm circular needles and dpns

ribbing needle: size us 7/ 4.5mm 16”/40cm circular needles or 2 sizes smaller than gauge needle

tools
stitch markers, tapestry needle

gauge
16 sts and 24 rounds = 4”/10cm in stockinette st in the round with gauge needle, blocked.
